title: Moroccan Egg
details: Moroccan baked eggs in rich tomato sauce. This hearty egg dish can be enjoyed on its own, with some crusty sourdough.

title: Bacon and Egg Salad
details: To cook the bacon using the Mauro Method line a baking sheet with parchment, overlapping each side 1 to 2 inches.

title: Sausage Bread
details: Sausage bread is one of the more typical Chinese bakery bread, and they come in many different kinds of shapes.

title: Grilled Chicken
details: Grilled Chicken is a very popular recipe made with chicken, hung curd and spices like cumin powder and black pepper.

title: Stir Fried Spinach with Salted Egg
details: Having made a few salted eggs at home, I couldn’t wait to try how they tasted like and made several traditional Chinese.

title: Air Fryer Crispy Beef
details: Spray the whole garlic with oil and pop into the roasting draw at 160°C for around 20 mins.

title: Beef Bourguignon
details: Beef dishes are often nostalgic. Whether it's a cultural classic like steak frites that will transport you to France.

title: Beef Wellington
details: Beef Wellington is the ultimate elegant dish. It's not nearly as difficult to make as people think.
